item.title: Messed up! Sprites! Heeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeelp!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

{
try
{

pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
